abstract: The British bank HSBC’s bid to sell its stake in the Ping An Group is in jeopardy after the China Development Bank decided not to finance a large part of the transaction.
snippet: The British bank HSBC’s bid to sell its stake in the Ping An Group is in jeopardy after the China Development Bank decided not to finance a large part of the transaction.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI — The British bank HSBC’s plan to sell its stake in the Ping An Group is in jeopardy after the China Development Bank decided not to finance a large part of the $9.4 billion deal.

headline.main: HSBC Sale of $9.4 Billion Ping An Stake in Jeopardy
headline.print_headline: Chinese Bank Threatens HSBC’s Sale of $9.4 Billion Ping An Stake

byline.original: By David Barboza and Keith Bradsher
